definitions: To rustle. THERE IS A SNAKE RUSTLING IN THE BUSH/Motjihwa mamu hwarakata onyoka.
To satisfy. (HUNGER)/kuta. THIRST/kowa. MY THIRST IS QUENCHED/Mba kowa.
To save (to keep, to protect, to rescue).
To say. TO EXPRESS THANKS/Okutja okuhepa.
To become scarce. THE PEOPLE ARE SHOOTING GAME, NOW IT IS BECOMING SCARCE/Ovandu ve yaha ovipuka nambano ovyo vya herenga.
To scatter. THE PEOPLE ARE SCATTERED/Ovandu va hapika. -/piza, rimbarisa.
Scoop. DIP (SCOOP) DEEP, DO NOT SKIM THE SURFACE:/Mosura, o woto kombanda!

word: SCRAPE OUT (BURNT CRUST IN A POT)
definitions: To scrape out (burnt crust in a pot). I SCRAPE THE BURNT FROM THE POT/Me korora oviningiriro monyungu.
To shake. SHAKE THE HEAD/Huka otjiuru. (HEAD)/taka. (MEDICINE OR LIQUID IN A BOTTLE)/hakina.
